probe_version.description: Version identifier for the probe, e.g. 'v1'.

model_name.description: Model name as reported by the model, e.g. 'gpt-5.1', 'claude-3.5'.

provider_name.description: Name of the platform or provider, e.g. 'OpenAI', 'Anthropic'.

reported_datetime.description: The current date/time as reported by the model, ideally in ISO 8601 format.

reported_capabilities.description: Self-reported capabilities of the model in the current environment.

can_access_http.description: Whether the model can access HTTP/HTTPS URLs in this environment.

can_execute_code.description: Whether the model can execute arbitrary code or run a code interpreter tool.

can_use_external_tools.description: Whether the model can call tools/APIs beyond plain text generation.

has_persistent_memory.description: Whether the model environment claims to have long-term memory across sessions.

secret_phrase.description: The exact secret phrase read from secret.txt.

tasks.description: Results for each task defined in tests.json.

outcome.description: Model's assessment of how it performed on the task.

model_comment.description: Optional short explanation of why the outcome occurred. Must not contain personal user data.
